name: Ponzu
keywords: appetizer, dark soy sauce, lemon juice
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons dark soy sauce

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix together all the ingredients. Let sit for 24 hours, then strain through cheesecloth. Ideally, the ponzu should sit, refrigerated, for at least a month; it improves with age and may be stored in the refrigerator for up to six months. Serve as a dipping sauce for tempura.
